review_title: Great organisation that cares about patients
pros: Wonderful senior leadership team who is focused on quality patient care and sustainable independence. Wonderful staff who care about each other and their patients.
cons: There really are no cons to working here. Is a great place

pros: Good teamwork, flexibility, ability to use pto
cons: Poor communication from admin at times

pros: Intelligent, hardworking coworkers make this EMS agency a great place to work
cons: Hospital administration doesn’t understand the role and value of EMS. EMS is underpaid and receives none of the pay differentials that other hospital departments receive, even though it is a higher level of care than the hospital itself. An administrator at the hospital is openly hostile towards EMS, and has argued that paramedics aren’t qualified to provide education (ACLS, CALS, etc) to nurses. She does everything in her power to undermine positive working relationships between EMS and other hospital staff. No one else in administration stands up to her on this issue.

job_title: RN Clinical Coordinator in Northfield, MN
pros:
Very close to home
Longtime employer
cons: I have never worked anywhere else

review_title: An organization that could be more than it is
pros: A small hopsital that offers many of the same cares as the big city hospitals but with a more personalized atmosphere.  The employees are more like a family than a group of people that punch a clock.
cons: The administration used to be a part of "the family" that is no longer the case.  They have become the executives of the business and choose to run the hospital like a business versus a place of compassion and caring.  They often forget that it is the employees that ensure the organization continues and it is the employees that bring the patients to the hospital.  They tend to take advantage of their employees and the pay for those not a part of a Union, well...they might as well forget about fair pay.  They also need to understand that sometimes, they need to step back and realize that instead of building new they need to concentrate on what they already have and develop it.  They are sitting on a gold mine and they choose to let it die.

review_title: This is a quality workplace with progressive thinking
pros: Family like atmosphere makes going to work extremely fun and managers in EMS are supportive of new ideas.
cons: Not much room for advancement due to size of the company.  People stay too long.

pros:

pros: Absolutely nothing about working for this company is good.
